Description:
Detects the creation of a named pipe as used by CobaltStrike

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Wojciech Lesicki
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: CobaltStrike Named Pipe
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (pipe_name like '\netlogon_%' or pipe_name like '\lsarpc_%' or pipe_name like '\wkssvc_%' or pipe_name like '\postex_%' or pipe_name like '\status_%' or pipe_name like '\mojo_%' or pipe_name like '\interprocess_%' or pipe_name like '\samr_%' or pipe_name like '\srvsvc_%' or (pipe_name like '%\msse-%' and pipe_name like '%-server%') or pipe_name like '\msagent_%')
